titles.title: 264 Since Jesus Came Into My Heart (nice, easy)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
What a wonderful change
In my life has been wrought
Since Jesus came into my heart
I have light in my soul
For which long I had sought
Since Jesus came into my heart

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Since Jesus came into my heart
Since Jesus came into my heart
Floods of joy o'er my soul like the sea billows roll
Since Jesus came into my heart

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I have ceased from my wand'ring and going astray
Since Jesus came into my heart
And my sins
Which were many
Are all washed away
Since Jesus came into my heart

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I'm possessed of a hope
that is steadfast and sure
Since Jesus came into my heart
And no dark clouds of doubt now my pathway obscure
Since Jesus came into my heart

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ther's a light
in the valley of death now for me
Since Jesus came into my heart
And the gates
of the City beyond I can see
Since Jesus came into my heart

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I shall go there to dwell in that City I know
Since Jesus came into my heart
And I'm happy so happy as onward I go
Since Jesus came into my heart
